modName: Supernatural - a mod for monster hunters
summary: This mod helps you roleplay as a monster-hunter character by pointing you towards quests involving vampires, werewolves, necromancers, spirits, and other supernatural creatures.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Are you a fan of the popular series [i]Supernatural?[/i] Or do you just like killing vampires, werewolves, and other such creatures? If so, this may be the mod for you! 

In the show, Sam and Dean Winchester hear about unusual occurrences through the newspaper and television. Your character will learn about them through letters from your contacts (who are unnamed, so feel free to make up backstories for them if you want).

What this mod [b][i]does[/i][/b]:
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Points you in the direction of supernatural-esque quests without feeling out of place or immersion-breaking.[/size]
[*][size=3]Letters are sent based on the player's level. If you are level 8, for example, you won't receive a letter pointing you towards a quest where you should be at least level 24. [/size]
[/list][size=3]
What this mod [b][i]doesn't [/i][/b]do:
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Add new quests, creatures, or items. The only things added by this mod are letters.[/size]
[*][size=3]Change anything in vanilla Skyrim; ergo, it should be compatible with everything.[/size]
[*][size=3]Mention faction quests.[/size]
[/list][size=3]
Quests referred to by this mod:
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Ill Met By Moonlight[/size]
[*][size=3]Laid To Rest[/size]
[*][size=3]The Man Who Cried Wolf[/size]
[*][size=3]Blood On The Ice[/size]
[*][size=3]Ancestral Worship[/size]
[*][size=3]The Taste of Death[/size]
[*][size=3]Waking Nightmare[/size]
[*][size=3]Evil In Waiting[/size]
[*][size=3]Repentance[/size]
[*][size=3]A Scroll for Anska[/size]
[*][size=3]The Pale Lady
[/size]
[*][size=3]The Mind of Madness[/size]
[*][size=3]Lifting the Shroud[/size]
[*][size=3]The Ghost of Old Hroldan[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][size=3]If you have any quest recommendations for this list, let me know!
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]
[/size]
author: bethanyk1879
